rows.label: tlk43400046_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Most Invidian noble houses have their
own mercenary forces.

rows.label: tlk43400046_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I told my dad we should acquire the
Hr√¶svelgr Mercenaries...
But we were already too late.

rows.label: tlk43400046_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Seems like they're having success
under a new leader...

rows.label: tlk43400046_03_msg0006
rows.name:
I think it's scandalous that someone
not from a noble house should have a
mercenary force...

rows.label: tlk43400046_03_msg0007
rows.name:
But it's not illegal. So I suppose not
really much can be done about it.
